thread.title: Jack Dorsey's Square posts wider quarterly loss

title: Jack Dorsey's Square posts wider quarterly loss
text: February 27, 2018 / 9:19 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago Jack Dorsey's Square posts wider quarterly loss Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 27 (Reuters) - Payments processor Square Incâ€™s quarterly loss widened from a year earlier, hurt by higher expenses related to product development and marketing. The company, led by Twitter Inc Chief Executive Officer Jack Dorsey, said on Tuesday loss widened to $15.7 million, or 4 cents per share, in the fourth quarter ended Dec. 31 from $15.2 million, or 4 cents per share, a year earlier. ( squ.re/2AlRpyb ) Adjusted revenue rose to $282.7 million from $191.9 million. (Reporting by Nikhil Subba in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel)
